Flavours.Name: Classic Vanilla
Flavours.Desc: Indulge in the timeless classic - smooth and creamy vanilla ice cream.

Flavours.Name: Decadent Chocolat
Flavours.Desc: Rich and velvety chocolate ice cream for the ultimate chocolate lover.

Flavours.Name: Scrumptious Strawberry
Flavours.Desc: Fresh and fruity strawberry ice cream bursting with flavor.

Flavours.Name: Minty Fresh
Flavours.Desc: Cool and refreshing mint ice cream with real mint leaves.

Flavours.Name: Creamy Coffee
Flavours.Desc: Smooth and creamy coffee ice cream made with premium coffee beans.

Toppings.Name: Sprinkles
Toppings.Desc: Add colorful sprinkles to your ice cream for extra fun!

Toppings.Name: Chocolate Chips
Toppings.Desc: Satisfy your chocolate craving with delicious chocolate chips.

Toppings.Name: Nuts
Toppings.Desc: Crunchy nuts add a delightful texture to your ice cream.

Toppings.Name: Fruit
Toppings.Desc: Enjoy the freshness of seasonal fruits as a topping for your ice cream.

Toppings.Name: Whipped Cream
Toppings.Desc: Top off your ice cream with a dollop of fluffy whipped cream.

Specials.Name: Red Velvet Delight
Specials.Desc: Indulge in the luxurious flavor of red velvet with creamy swirls of vanilla and chocolate.

Specials.Name: Caramel Swirl
Specials.Desc: Experience the rich and buttery taste of caramel blended perfectly with smooth ice cream.

Specials.Name: Matcha Green Tea
Specials.Desc: Enjoy the unique and refreshing taste of matcha green tea in every scoop.

Specials.Name: Chocolate Chip Sandwich
Specials.Desc: Delicious chocolate chip cookies filled with creamy vanilla ice cream.

Specials.Name: Double Fudge Sandwich
Specials.Desc: Rich fudge brownies sandwiching smooth chocolate ice cream.

Specials.Name: Oatmeal Raisin Sandwich
Specials.Desc: Chewy oatmeal raisin cookies paired with cinnamon ice cream.

Specials.Name: Banana Split
Specials.Desc: A classic banana split with scoops of vanilla, chocolate, and strawberry ice cream, topped with whipped cream and cherries.

Specials.Name: Brownie Sundae
Specials.Desc: Warm brownie topped with vanilla ice cream, hot fudge, and nuts.

Specials.Name: Caramel Apple Sundae
Specials.Desc: Apple pie filling, vanilla ice cream, and caramel drizzle.

Specials.Name: Chocolate Ice Cream Cake
Specials.Desc: Decadent chocolate ice cream layered with chocolate cake and fudge.

Specials.Name: Strawberry Shortcake
Specials.Desc: Layers of strawberry ice cream and vanilla cake with fresh strawberries.

Specials.Name: Mint Chocolate Chip Cake
Specials.Desc: Refreshing mint chocolate chip ice cream with layers of chocolate cake.
